name: Social Loop
description:
Hello Guys This My Game Social Loop For My First Ludum Dare (47) theme stuck in loop

How to Play :

-Facebook Game : Left and Right Arrow and Space For Jump (Normal Control)

- Instagram Game : Default Control (W,D,A,S) or (Use Arrows)

- Youtube Game : Default Control Just Click the Same Direction Of Coming Video

Finally : 

this my First LdJam so its not perfect, so I hope you Feedback to Improve My Self.
